in_ports.name: input
in_ports.caption: external parameter
in_ports.hint:
Chain constant or one of external parameters of the chain.
When specified, this function simply returns a copy of this scalar (other arguments are ignored).

controls.caption: How to represent result
controls.name: conditionStyle
controls.description:
How the created boolean value will be represented in the result scalar.
C-like: true is "1", false is "0".
Java-like: true is "true" string, false is "false" string.

NOTE: you SHOULD specify system name of this function to use this block as an input parameter, if you are calling this chain as a chain from other solutions.
